Finland's Stubb extends lead in opinion poll ahead of electionFinnish centre-right presidential front-runner Alexander Stubb slightly extended his lead against liberal Green Party member Pekka Haavisto in a new opinion poll published on Thursday ahead of the Jan. 28 election. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:55:40 GMT J7W6T25IWVPTREDXCK4PUIO3R4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finlands-stubb-extends-lead-opinion-poll-ahead-election-2024-01-18/Anne Kauranen世界欧洲
Winter weather upends travel in Germany for a second dayHeavy snowfall and icy conditions upended air, car and train travel across Germany for a second day on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:25:22 GMT VF72JPTP6BN7FKAKKOBLCST2EU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/winter-weather-upends-travel-germany-second-day-2024-01-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: India could ease China investment curbs if border stays calmIndia could ease its heightened scrutiny of Chinese investments if the two countries' border remains peaceful, a senior Indian official said in the first signal that the four-year-old curbs could be lifted. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:12:16 GMT 22LDOBSUMJJTXMJYS7OEHID234 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-could-ease-china-investment-curbs-if-border-stays-calm-2024-01-18/Una Galani,, Peter Thal Larsen商业达沃斯
Night curfew imposed in Comoros after president's re-election sparks protestsAn overnight curfew has been imposed in the Indian Ocean nation of Comoros after violent protests against President Azali Assoumani's re-election rocked the archipelago, the interior ministry said. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 07:45:03 GMT 5HYZITHRFZIZ3DK252RMGXNKQY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/night-curfew-impose-comoros-after-presidents-re-election-sparks-protests-2024-01-18/Abdou Moustoifa世界非洲
Indian Navy says crew of vessel attacked in Gulf of Aden is safeIndia's navy said on Thursday that it responded to a drone attack distress call from a Marshall Islands-flagged vessel in the Gulf of Aden and that the ship's crew were safe, with a fire on board under control. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 07:35:57 GMT ZSAUSORND5PUDD4T76W453GJLY https://www.reuters.com/world/indian-navy-responds-drone-attack-distress-call-vessel-ani-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
Who are the separatists targeted by Pakistan's strikes in Iran?Pakistan said on Thursday it had carried out airstrikes against separatist militants in Iran, the latest step in a tense standoff after Iran's missile and drone strikes in the South Asian nation's border province of Balochistan. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 07:33:34 GMT O2TLESCETJOKZDZCY326UDB27E https://www.reuters.com/world/who-are-separatists-targeted-by-pakistans-strikes-iran-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
Indonesia's Prabowo keeps strong lead in election poll but runoff loomsIndonesian presidential candidate Prabowo Subianto has a commanding lead but is stagnating in popularity just a few weeks out from next month's election, an opinion poll showed on Thursday, raising the chance of a second-round runoff in June. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 07:26:54 GMT GC7VQPENLFLOHNNN4E6IUGDVCI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-prabowo-keeps-strong-lead-election-poll-runoff-looms-2024-01-18/Kate Lamb, Ananda Teresia世界亚太地区
Bellwether English town disenchanted with PM Sunak's ConservativesSilvia Sherwood believes it is time for a change of government in Britain at this year's election, saying an economy that forces cash-strapped elderly women to seek warmth in shops needs to be fixed. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 07:03:38 GMT C33BWSA2QROCBL67ERAJRAI2TE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/bellwether-english-town-disenchanted-with-pm-sunaks-conservatives-2024-01-18/Andrew Macaskill世界英国
Ukraine starts to rebuild towns and cities even as the war rages onAn excavator belches out fumes as it clears earth and rubble from between the train and bus stations in the Ukrainian town of Trostianets to make way for a reimagined transport hub. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 07:02:46 GMT GKL73TKJDFLPDMB7DTFMUVC2J4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-starts-rebuild-towns-cities-even-war-rages-2024-01-18/Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Ukrainian air force shoots down 22 out of 33 Russian drones overnight, Kyiv saysRussia launched 33 drones and two missiles at Ukraine overnight, with air defences destroying 22 drones, the Ukrainian military said on Thursday. Maersk says winter weather, Red Sea disruption cause congestionWeather-related disruption at ports in northern Europe and the diversion of vessels away from the Red Sea are causing congestion at container terminals, A.P. Moller-Maersk said in an update to customers on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 06:18:51 GMT OYLF4AR3MJOZNFZUU45PNCMZFY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/maersk-says-poor-weather-europe-red-sea-disruption-cause-congestion-2024-01-18/Reuters世界中东
